oai_dc:dc.dc:title: FIELD ANALYSIS OF WAVE ACTION ON BREAKWATER
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Muraca, Alessandro
Rossi, Vito
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: field analysis
breakwater
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Field analysis of breakwater damage progression has been performed using monitoring programs which included both photographic and topographic surveying. Reliable information on cover blocks displacement were obtained using a metric camera and a digitizer. Measured damage was compared with those estimated using empirical formulae. A computer model, capable of predicting damage progression, has been also calibrated using in site collected data. Predicted damage has been satisfactory also for long time interval period.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
